tool_description: Fetch search results, citations, and profiles from Google Scholar.
name: Scholar API
title: Scholar API

api_list.name: Citation
api_list.description: Return a page of search results from Google Scholar given a citation ID. A citation ID is a 20-length numeric identification number.

api_list.name: Profile
api_list.description: Return profile information and articles given a valid user.

api_list.name: Scholar
api_list.description: Return a page of profile search results from Google Scholar given a query.

api_list.name: Search
api_list.description: Return a page of article search results from Google Scholar given a query.
